title: Outlet muhaaa
text:
First of all, the village looks nice. During corona go there an hiur before closure so it is already less less crowded.

A lot of shops and choice.

But outlet? Black friday? No online or in the city centre the prices are better.

You will have a nice day out for sure

title: Worthless staff
text:
It is corona time also in Amsterdam. Restaurants are closed. So all is delivery or take away. At the Westerpark you can walk thru same nature and have a warm coco and some chrurros if you like.

But BOT at this place.
2 customers in front of you who only take gluwein takes 10 minutes.

Ones you ordered, your food wil not come, you see the cook coming out for a sigaret which is not very helping and 4 other employees(why don't they help at the cash register?) Are just chilling.

After 10 minutes later some is coming to you: "are you waiting for something?"

After receiving the food it is just "sorry". Total atmosphere is already gone.

Worthles staff: not in the mood, dirty and queue that takes ages
